comment:
Extracted Variables:
- L: Number of LED fixtures to be installed
- F: Number of fluorescence lamps to be installed

Definitions:
- L + F = 300 (Total number of light fixtures required)
- 5L + 8F \leq 2000 (Total units of electricity consumed should not exceed 2000)
- F \geq 0.3(L) (At least 30% of the implemented lights must be fluorescence lamps)
- Minimize: 3L + 4F (Total number of times the lights need to be changed)
